name: Homegear::download
shortDescription: Downloads a file from a web server
description: This method downloads a file from a web server. It was implemented so you can download files (SSL encrypted) on embedded systems when OpenSSL certificate verification is not working. You should not use it to download large files because the download is fully saved to the memory before it is written to the disk.
signatures: bool download(string $hostname, int $port, string $path, string $filename, string $caFile, bool $verifyCertificate)

parameters.name: hostname
parameters.description: The hostname of the web server you want to get the source from

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port number the web server listens on

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the file to be returned

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename to which you want to save the file

parameters.name: caFile
parameters.description: The path to the certificate file you want to use to verify the web server certificate

parameters.name: verifyCertificate
parameters.description: Enables certificate verification; disable it only for testing purposes.

returnValue: Returns "true" on success and "false" on errors
